attributes.action: RETIREMENT AT 60 FOR WOMEN AND MEN
attributes.additional_details: BY REDUCING THE RETIREMENT AGE FOR THOSE WHO WOULD LIKE IT  INSTEAD OF INCREASING IT, PEOPLE CAN LOOK AFTER THEIR ELDERLY RELATIVES INSTEAD OF PUTTING THEM IN HOMES ,CARE FOR THEIR GRANDCHILDREN INSTEAD OF PUTTING THEM IN NURSERIES, GIVE THEIR JOBS TO THE UNEMPLOYED WHO WILL NEVER GET A JOB OTHERWISE .  FOR THOSE OF US WHO WILL NOT BE ABLE TO DO THEIR CURRENT JOB UNTIL WE ARE 66 BECAUSE OF HEALTH ISSUES THIS WOULD BE A GREAT RELIEF.
